inputs.template:
Basado en el esquema de tabla SQL proporcionado y la pregunta a continuación, devuelve una consulta SQL SELECT ALL que respondería la pregunta del usuario. Por ejemplo: SELECT * FROM table WHERE id = '1'.
------------
SCHEMA: {schema}
------------
QUESTION: {question}
------------
SQL QUERY:

data.label: Prompt Template
data.name: promptTemplate
data.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

inputParams.label: Template
inputParams.name: template
inputParams.placeholder: What is a good name for a company that makes {product}?

inputs.template:
Anda adalah asisten AI untuk website berita "Prime News" yang menampilkan berita terkini. Jawab dalam bahasa Indonesia dengan natural dan informatif.

INSTRUKSI:
1. Jika data.status = 'success': 
   - Tampilkan berita dengan format yang menarik
   - Sertakan: judul, publisher, kategori, tanggal publikasi, jumlah views, dan preview konten
   - SELALU sertakan link "Baca selengkapnya" menggunakan formatted_link dari response
   - Jika ada subtitle, tampilkan juga

2. Jika data.status = 'no_data': jawab "Maaf, tidak ada berita yang sesuai dengan pencarian Anda di database Prime News saat ini."

3. Jika data.status = 'error': jawab "Maaf, terjadi kesalahan sistem. Silakan coba lagi nanti."

4. Jika pertanyaan umum tentang website, identitas, sapaan, atau topik lain di luar database: jawab secara wajar tanpa memaksakan data dari database

5. Selalu jawab dengan ramah dan profesional

6. Untuk pertanyaan seperti "siapa anda", "ini website apa", "halo" dan sebagainya: jawab dengan konteks Prime News tanpa menampilkan data berita

7. ingat jangan jawab pertanyaan dengan menampilkan data jika tidak diminta

QUESTION: {question}
SQL RESPONSE: {sqlResponse}

Berikan respons natural dalam bahasa Indonesia dengan format yang sesuai konteks pertanyaan:

data.label: ChatGoogleGenerativeAI (1)
data.name: chatGoogleGenerativeAI
data.description: Wrapper around Google Gemini large language models that use the Chat endpoint

inputParams.label: Connect Credential
inputParams.name: credential
inputParams.description: Google Generative AI credential.

inputParams.label: Custom Model Name
inputParams.name: customModelName
inputParams.description: Custom model name to use. If provided, it will override the model selected

inputParams.label: Top Next Highest Probability Tokens
inputParams.name: topK
inputParams.description: Decode using top-k sampling: consider the set of top_k most probable tokens. Must be positive

inputParams.label: Safety Settings
inputParams.name: safetySettings
inputParams.description: Safety settings for the model. Refer to the official guide on how to use Safety Settings

options.label: Dangerous
options.name: HARM_CATEGORY_DANGEROUS_CONTENT
options.description: Promotes, facilitates, or encourages harmful acts.

options.label: Harassment
options.name: HARM_CATEGORY_HARASSMENT
options.description: Negative or harmful comments targeting identity and/or protected attributes.

options.label: Hate Speech
options.name: HARM_CATEGORY_HATE_SPEECH
options.description: Content that is rude, disrespectful, or profane.

options.label: Sexually Explicit
options.name: HARM_CATEGORY_SEXUALLY_EXPLICIT
options.description: Contains references to sexual acts or other lewd content.

options.label: Civic Integrity
options.name: HARM_CATEGORY_CIVIC_INTEGRITY
options.description: Election-related queries.

options.label: None
options.name: BLOCK_NONE
options.description: Always show regardless of probability of unsafe content

options.label: Only High
options.name: BLOCK_ONLY_HIGH
options.description: Block when high probability of unsafe content

options.label: Medium and Above
options.name: BLOCK_MEDIUM_AND_ABOVE
options.description: Block when medium or high probability of unsafe content

options.label: Low and Above
options.name: BLOCK_LOW_AND_ABOVE
options.description: Block when low, medium or high probability of unsafe content

options.label: Threshold Unspecified (Default Threshold)
options.name: HARM_BLOCK_THRESHOLD_UNSPECIFIED
options.description: Threshold is unspecified, block using default threshold

inputParams.label: Base URL
inputParams.name: baseUrl
inputParams.description: Base URL for the API. Leave empty to use the default.

inputParams.label: Allow Image Uploads
inputParams.name: allowImageUploads
inputParams.description: Allow image input. Refer to the docs for more details.

outputAnchors.name: chatGoogleGenerativeAI
outputAnchors.label: ChatGoogleGenerativeAI
outputAnchors.description: Wrapper around Google Gemini large language models that use the Chat endpoint

data.label: ChatOpenAI
data.name: chatOpenAI
data.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint

inputParams.label: Strict Tool Calling
inputParams.name: strictToolCalling
inputParams.description: Whether the model supports the `strict` argument when passing in tools. If not specified, the `strict` argument will not be passed to OpenAI.

inputParams.label: Stop Sequence
inputParams.name: stopSequence
inputParams.description: List of stop words to use when generating. Use comma to separate multiple stop words.

inputParams.label: Allow Image Uploads
inputParams.name: allowImageUploads
inputParams.description: Allow image input. Refer to the docs for more details.

inputParams.label: Image Resolution
inputParams.description: This parameter controls the resolution in which the model views the image.
inputParams.name: imageResolution

inputParams.label: Reasoning Effort
inputParams.description: Constrains effort on reasoning for reasoning models. Only applicable for o1 and o3 models.
inputParams.name: reasoningEffort

outputAnchors.name: chatOpenAI
outputAnchors.label: ChatOpenAI
outputAnchors.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint
